pages.text: $(o)Protoplasm is an ethereal substance that doesn't abide by some of the laws of physics. In its item form, it floats weightlessly in the air.
$(o)By applying this substance to a boat, it will gain the ability to float through the air, at least until the coating wears off.
$(o)Coating an arrow in it will produce arrows that do not fall with distance.

$(o)Finally, attaching sacs of this substance to a lether vest allows us to achieve true Levitation! While wearing the vest, a person will not be subject to gravity. However, once airborn, they cannot change their height nor vertial momentum.
